file_content.text: Perfect timing.
I'm not the one who has a problem showing up when I'm supposed to.
Geez, how long are you planning to hold that over me?
The rest of your life, naturally.
Thanks for keeping my worse half out of too much trouble.
I'm used to it by now.
Business as usual.
And richer for it.
You should ease up on him, I don't think he's worked this hard for anything in his life.
Gault's not so bad.
Oh, money tends to make him real industrious.
I was talking about you.
She'll make a semi-honest man out of me yet.
I forgot what a handful your boyfriend is.
More trouble than I care for.
I seem to recall spending a lot less time ducking before I met you.
He said that on our first heist too. He's cute when he's nervous.
It helped that you tempered my expectations accordingly.
I was forewarned.
Singing my praises again?
The lower octaves.
You never could hold a tune. Ow!
You two... are a couple?
Worse-half?
Don't sound so surprised.
It's complicated.
You don't consider that "too much trouble"?
We just jumped off a starship.
Mm, we've had way closer calls.
Don't let her fool you, I'm the cautious one in this arrangement.
Anyway, I think we've all had our fill of Vandin and it's going to get a lot less hospitable shortly, so... shall we?
Let's get our haul back to Odessen.
Okay, so... remember Plan C?
You never actually got to Plan C, Gault.
Turns out Plan C is: Jump!
Mother was here. Again! She had the audacity to wear my face!
And her punishment?
Escaped. She knows I won't be bested the next time we meet.
Are empty threats all you've brought for me?
I interrupted their little raid on the treasury. They couldn't have accomplished much in the time they were here.
Mother!
Hey, so, just thinking of you, wanted to sa-- trouble? No! Everything's going great. Just taking a little detour on the way home.
Gault?
Shh! The noise? Just a little windy is all. What plan am I on? I don't... uh... Plan C, we're on Plan C, alright?
Yeah, yeah, sounds lovely. Gotta go, see you soon.
The good news is we can reach the Skyhook from here.
And the bad?
If you've got a fear of heights, there will be plenty of time to get over it on the way down.
